Attacks.Name: Bullet Punch
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: X-Scissor
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Iron Head
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Metal Claw
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, increase this attack Strength by 1 for its next turn.

Superpowers.Name: Technician
Superpowers.Effect: This character may reroll one die in its attack rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Double Team
Superpowers.Effect: The next time this character would be targeted by an attack, the attacking character must roll one additional die for each success in their attack roll. If they roll fewer tan half successes than the original attack roll, the attack misses.

Superpowers.Name: Swords Dance
Superpowers.Effect: The next time this character makes an attack this turn, add 3 dice to the attack roll.

Attacks.Name: Hyper Beam
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains the Stun special condition.
